      },
      "source": [
        "#Install libraries\n",
        "library(ggplot2)\n",
        "library(readr)\n",
        "library(lubridate)\n",
        "library(stringi)\n",
        "library(tidyverse)\n",
        "library(caret)\n",
        "library(tidyr)\n",
        "library(stringr)"
      ],
      "execution_count": 0,
      "outputs": []
    },
    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "FXBCx9qPTlPo",
        "colab_type": "code",
        "colab": {}
      },
      "source": [
        "#download data set Movielens\n",
        "dl <- tempfile()\n",
        " download.file(\"http://files.grouplens.org/datasets/movielens/ml-10m.zip\", dl)"
      ],
      "execution_count": 0,
      "outputs": []
    },
    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "G23xPKjETyPY",
        "colab_type": "code",
        "colab": {}
      },
      "source": [
        "#Read table\n",
        "ratings <- read.table(text = gsub(\"::\", \"\\t\", readLines(unzip(dl, \"ml-10M100K/ratings.dat\"))),\n",
        "                      col.names = c(\"userId\", \"movieId\", \"rating\", \"timestamp\"))"
      ],
      "execution_count": 0,
      "outputs": []
    },
    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "-nT2QsRyU55a",
        "colab_type": "code",
        "colab": {}
      },
      "source": [
        "#Split dataset\n",
        "movies <- str_split_fixed(readLines(unzip(dl, \"ml-10M100K/movies.dat\")), \"\\\\::\", 3)\n",
        "colnames(movies) <- c(\"movieId\", \"title\", \"genres\")"
      ],
      "execution_count": 0,
      "outputs": []
    },
    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "Inf40R28Vali",
        "colab_type": "code",
        "colab": {}
      },
      "source": [
        " #Mutate, rename title\n",
        " movies <- as.data.frame(movies) %>% mutate(movieId = as.numeric(levels(movieId))[movieId],\n",
        "                                            title = as.character(title),\n",
        "                                            genres = as.character(genres))"
      ],
      "execution_count": 0,
      "outputs": []
    },
    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "1dsto0MWVciq",
        "colab_type": "code",
        "colab": {}
      },
      "source": [
        "movielens <- left_join(ratings, movies, by = \"movieId\")"
      ],
      "execution_count": 0,
      "outputs": []
    },
    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "9nwm8m6nVeid",
        "colab_type": "code",
        "outputId": "e9aad505-43df-4164-a5b5-7beddc0cc95a",
        "colab": {
          "base_uri": "https://localhost:8080/",
          "height": 50
        }
      },
      "source": [
        "# Validation set will be 10% of MovieLens data\n",
        "set.seed(1, sample.kind=\"Rounding\")\n",
        "\n",
        "# if using R 3.5 or earlier, use `set.seed(1)` instead\n",
        "test_index <- createDataPartition(y = movielens$rating, times = 1, p = 0.1, list = FALSE)\n",
        " edx <- movielens[-test_index,]\n",
        " temp <- movielens[test_index,]"
      ],
      "execution_count": 219,
      "outputs": [
        {
          "output_type": "stream",
          "text": [
            "Warning message in set.seed(1, sample.kind = \"Rounding\"):\n",
            "“non-uniform 'Rounding' sampler used”\n"
          ],
          "name": "stderr"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "8sukJT4hVjKk",
        "colab_type": "code",
        "colab": {}
      },
      "source": [
        "# Make sure userId and movieId in validation set are also in edx set\n",
        "validation <- temp %>% \n",
        "      semi_join(edx, by = \"movieId\") %>%\n",
        "      semi_join(edx, by = \"userId\")"
      ],
      "execution_count": 0,
      "outputs": []
    },
    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "S-6OP8voWQ2b",
        "colab_type": "code",
        "outputId": "e97ba1cf-6b23-4cd5-8c71-c811dd31306c",
        "colab": {
          "base_uri": "https://localhost:8080/",
          "height": 50
        }
      },
      "source": [
        "# Add rows removed from validation set back into edx set\n",
        "removed <- anti_join(temp, validation)\n",
        " edx <- rbind(edx, removed)\n",
        "\n",
        "rm(dl, ratings, movies, test_index, temp, movielens, removed)\n"
      ],
      "execution_count": 184,
      "outputs": [
        {
          "output_type": "stream",
          "text": [
            "Joining, by = c(\"userId\", \"movieId\", \"rating\", \"timestamp\", \"title\", \"genres\")\n",
            "\n"
          ],
          "name": "stderr"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "VvcDWe8aYhwh",
        "colab_type": "code",
        "colab": {}
      },
      "source": [
        "#validation dataset\n",
        "validation  <- validation %>% select(-rating)"
      ],
      "execution_count": 0,
      "outputs": []
    },

        "##What are the five most given ratings in order from most to least?"
      ]
    },
    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "gkRKZ83Qll5s",
        "colab_type": "code",
        "outputId": "1eb9c476-405b-4cd1-98d8-dc98b3ccc8dd",
        "colab": {
          "base_uri": "https://localhost:8080/",
          "height": 209
        }
      },
      "source": [
        "#Sort a variable in descending order.\n",
        "edx %>% group_by(rating) %>% \n",
        "summarize(count = n()) %>% \n",
        "top_n(5) %>%\n",
        "\tarrange(desc(count))"

      "source": [
        "#Rating movies\n",
        "rating4 <- table(edx$rating)[\"4\"]\n",
        "rating35 <- table(edx$rating)[\"3.5\"]\n",
        "rating3 <- table(edx$rating)[\"3\"]\n",
        "\n",
        "Result <- (rating35 < rating3 && rating35 < rating4)\n",
        "\n",
        "print(Result)\n",
        "\n",
        "rm(rating3, rating35,  rating4, Result)"
      ],

            "[1] TRUE\n"

      "source": [
        "data <- movies %>% separate_rows(genres, sep =\"\\\\|\")\n",
        "DAT.aggregate <- aggregate(formula = cbind(n = 1:nrow(dat)) ~ genres, data = data, FUN = length)"

      "outputs": []

      "source": [
        "#Creates Year column.\n",
        "edx <- edx %>% \n",
        "  mutate(title = str_trim(title)) %>%\n",
        "  extract(title, c(\"title_tmp\", \"year\"),\n",
        "          regex = \"^(.*) \\\\(([0-9 \\\\-]*)\\\\)$\",\n",
        "          remove = F) %>%\n",
        "  mutate(year = if_else(str_length(year) > 4,\n",
        "                        as.integer(str_split(year, \"-\",\n",
        "                                             simplify = T)[1]),\n",
        "                        as.integer(year))) %>%\n",
        "  mutate(title = if_else(is.na(title_tmp), title, title_tmp)) %>%\n",
        "  select(-title_tmp)  %>%\n",
        "  mutate(genres = if_else(genres == \"(No Genres Listed)\",\n",
        "                          `is.na<-`(genres), genres))\n",
        "validation <- temp %>% \n",
        "  semi_join(edx, by = \"movieId\") %>%\n",
        "  semi_join(edx, by = \"userId\")"
      ],
      "execution_count": 0,
      "outputs": []
    },

      "source": [
        "#Root Mean Square Error  \n",
        "RMSE <- function(true_ratings, predicted_ratings){\n",
        "        sqrt(mean((true_ratings - predicted_ratings)^2))\n",
        "      }\n",
        "      \n",
        "lambdas <- seq(0, 5, 0.25)\n",
        "rmses <- sapply(lambdas,function(l){\n",
        "  mu <- mean(edx$rating) #The mean of ratings from training set\n",
        "  \n",
        "  Movie_effect <- edx %>%  #Adjust mean by movie effect\n",
        "    group_by(movieId) %>%\n",
        "    summarize(Movie_effect = sum(rating - mu)/(n()+l))\n",
        "  \n",
        "  Movie_user <- edx %>% #Ajdust mean by movie effect and user  \n",
        "    left_join(Movie_effect, by=\"movieId\") %>%\n",
        "    group_by(userId) %>%\n",
        "    summarize(Movie_user = sum(rating - Movie_effect - mu)/(n()+l))\n",
        "  \n",
        "  predicted_ratings <- \n",
        "    edx %>% \n",
        "    left_join(Movie_effect, by = \"movieId\") %>%\n",
        "    left_join(Movie_user, by = \"userId\") %>%\n",
        "    mutate(pred = mu + Movie_effect + Movie_user) %>%\n",
        "    .$pred #Predict ratings \n",
        "  \n",
        "  return(RMSE(predicted_ratings, edx$rating))\n",
        "})\n",
        "plot(lambdas, rmses,\n",
        "    col = \"blue\")"
      ],
